      • addPetToHistoryCLinical

        public java.lang.String addPetToHistoryCLinical(java.lang.String medicamentForVeterinary,
                                                double doseForVeterinary,
                                                double costForVeterinary,
                                                int frecForVeterinary)
        Description This method allows to add new medicines that were prescription during the hospitalization at the patient stories. pre: The patient clinic story must be not null. post: New medicines were added to the patient clinic story.
        Parameters:
        medicamentForVeterinary - String The medicine name. This param must be not null.
        doseForVeterinary - double The medicine dose, this param refers to the amount of medicine supplied to the pet each time according the frequence assigned. This param must be not null.
        costForVeterinary - double The medicine cost by each dose. This param could be empty.
        frecForVeterinary - int The frequency of medicine application. This param could be empty.
        Returns:
        A message that indiques if medicine was added to the patient clinic story

      • calculateIBMOfAnimal

        public double calculateIBMOfAnimal()
        Description This method allows to calculate the body mass index for a pet. pre: The pet was created before and its attributes height and weight are not null neither height must be zero. post: The BMI is calculated.
        Returns:
        double turn The pet body mass index.

                                  int actualYear)
        Description este metodo calcula el costo de hospitalizacion
        Parameters:
        typeAnimal - String el tipo del animalito
        weight - double el peso del animalito
        actualDay - int el mes actual
        actualMonth - int el dia actual
        actualYear - int el anho actual
        Returns:
        double el costo de hospitalizacion
